PEXELS

Home


Pexels is an organization that provides legal ownership
of an image who creates an image and holds its copyright,
including the exclusive rights to it.

This is automatic as copyright exists even if the creator
never registers. Therefore it is reliable to store your work
on Pexels with a copyright office.

If the images are copyright free then anyone can use them
and can take advantage of the effectiveness of good images
from Pexels
